pages.text: This world welcomes you warmly, and then it will try to kill you. However, shall you survive, you will be able to enjoy all it has to offer!$(br)$(br)It appears that this world is one that readily rewards those who take part in $(bold)$(#66e0ff)$(l:exploration_category)Exploration$(reset), $(bold)$(#41f244)$(l:engineering_category)engineering$(reset), and $(bold)$(#a541f2)Magic$(reset).

And here are some other activities you could do for leisure, I suppose. There is a world of flavor to discover. Some folks devot their life to culinary pursuits, and that actually makes them stronger too, for some reason.$(br)$(br)Then you have your music. Some smart peopel figured out how to $(bold)etch$(reset) discs that play otherwordly music.
